original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2481)@<color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color>$Skill_range(2481)@ 對指定的地點施放大範圍迷魂煙霧，讓大範圍內的士兵與武將自相殘殺。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2481)@<color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color>$Skill_range(2481)@ Apply a magnified range of ecstasy smoke to the designated location , Let the soldiers and generals in a large area kill each other.
